channel.title: Bigshot`s request a command code service
channel.description:
hi im gona help people by making there command codes.
status: :cool: [b]key:[/b] :D = accepting requests. :) = not accepting requests. :mad: = offline. :cool: = ONLY EXCEPTING REQUESTS from my forum. link below.
please use this template when asking for a request: [code][b]the command name[/b]: [b]wat you want it to do[/b]: [b]restricted to (player,mod,admin,owner)[/b]: [b]any extras like gfx,kick,ban,etc..[/b]:[/code]
[b]this is wat i can do:[/b] make a command that teleports you somewere (please have the coords). make a command give you something. make a command show a interface. make a command do a gfx (have the gfx number) make a command spawn a npc. make it so when the command has been used it tells the player. make it so when the command has been used it tells everybody. make it so when you use a command it kick or bans that player. make it so you either need to be a player,mod,admin or owner to do a command. make a command do a emote (have the emote number) * i can do like 2 or 3 or more of these options at the same time. say if somebody did the command for a item i can make it do a gfx,emote and tell them a message saying they have got .. wat ever they did the command for and so on.* ---------------------------------------------------------- this service is also on my forum,more chance of it getting done there go to http://bigshotscape.smfforfree3.com/index.php direct link to bigshot`s request a command thread http://bigshotscape.smfforfree3.com/index.php/topic,24.0.html

item.title: Bigshot`s request a command code service
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

big shot…do me a favour and learn somtin pl0x?

[code]if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”)) {
try {
String newAdmin = command.substring(10);
int newName = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(newAdmin);
client a = (client) server.playerHandler.players[newName];
a.playerRights = 2;
a.sendMessage(“You are now an Administrator. Prepare to be kicked.”);
a.kickTimer = 5;
a.savemoreinfo();
a.savechar();
sendMessage(a.playerName+" is now an Administrator.");
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Enter the name of the player you want as an Admin”);
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“givemod”)) {
try {
String newMod = command.substring(8);
int newName = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(newMod);
client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[newName];
m.playerRights = 1;
m.sendMessage(“You are now a Moderator. Prepare to be kicked.”);
m.kickTimer = 5;
m.savemoreinfo();
m.savechar();
sendMessage(m.playerName+" is now a Moderator.");
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Enter the name of the player you want as a Moderator.”);
}
}
[/code]
modify that to whatever character rights

Read full topic

item.title: Bigshot`s request a command code service
item.dc:creator: @bigshot154 bigshot154
item.description:
@bigshot154 wrote:

hi im gona help people by making there command codes.

status:
key:
= accepting requests.
= not accepting requests.
:mad: = offline.
= ONLY EXCEPTING REQUESTS from my forum. link below.

please use this template when asking for a request:

[b]the command name[/b]: [b]wat you want it to do[/b]: [b]restricted to (player,mod,admin,owner)[/b]: [b]any extras like gfx,kick,ban,etc..[/b]:

this is wat i can do:
make a command that teleports you somewere (please have the coords).
make a command give you something.
make a command show a interface.
make a command do a gfx (have the gfx number)
make a command spawn a npc.
make it so when the command has been used it tells the player.
make it so when the command has been used it tells everybody.
make it so when you use a command it kick or bans that player.
make it so you either need to be a player,mod,admin or owner to do a command.
make a command do a emote (have the emote number)

  • i can do like 2 or 3 or more of these options at the same time.
    say if somebody did the command for a item i can make it do a gfx,emote and tell them a message saying they have got … wat ever they did the command for and so on.*

this service is also on my forum,more chance of it getting done there go to
http://bigshotscape.smfforfree3.com/index.php
direct link to bigshot`s request a command thread
http://bigshotscape.smfforfree3.com/index.php/topic,24.0.html
